verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H410>God,<s%> that <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee when thou <S%H1272>fleddest<s%> from the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> thy <S%H251>brother.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5973>with<s%> him, Put <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H8432>among<s%> you, and be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and <S%H2498>change<s%> your garments: <S%H8071><s%>

And let us <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H6030>answered<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>distress,<s%> and <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1980>went.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and all their <S%H5141>earrings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in their <S%H241>ears;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> them <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5973>by<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> and the <S%H2847>terror<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were round <S%H5439>about<s%> them, and they did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is, <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H416>El-bethel:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1540>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, when he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

But <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah's<s%> <S%H3243>nurse<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and she was <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> an <S%H437>oak:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H439>Allon-bachuth.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> out of <S%H4480>Padan-aram,<s%> <S%H6307><s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty:<s%> be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> and a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee, and <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall come <S%H3318>out<s%> of thy <S%H4480>loins;<s%> <S%H2504><s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> to thee I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it, and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> set <S%H5324>up<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, even a <S%H4678>pillar<s%> of <S%H68>stone:<s%> and he <S%H5258>poured<s%> a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and he <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>thereon.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H4480>Bethel;<s%> <S%H1008><s%> and there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5750>but<s%> a little <S%H3530>way<s%> <S%H776><s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath:<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H3205>travailed,<s%> and she had <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H3205>labor.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when she was in <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H3205>labor,<s%> that the <S%H3205>midwife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not;<s%> thou shalt have <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as her <S%H5315>soul<s%> was in <S%H3318>departing,<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> she <S%H4191>died)<s%> that she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1126>Ben-oni:<s%> but his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> him <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H6900>grave:<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is the <S%H4678>pillar<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H6900>grave<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> and <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H1973><s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H4029>Edar.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> that <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and lay <S%H7901>with<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6370>concubine:<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it. Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8147>twelve:<s%> <S%H6240><s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah;<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and Zebulun: <S%H2074><s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel;<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H8198>handmaid;<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H8198>handmaid;<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H836>Asher:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H6307>Padan-aram.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> unto <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> unto the city of <S%H7153>Arbah,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned.<s%>
And the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>ghost,<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> being <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days:<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> him.
